summary: Adds rideable Theriums to the world of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds rideable Theriums to the world of Skyrim.
The Theriums are scaled down in size to fix some bugs. They can\'t jump, and the swimming animations are messed up.

You can find a herd of 5 or so roaming the plains outside of Whiterun.

I will release updates in the future.
Thanks for downloading.

Requires Moonpath to Elsweyr by muppetpuppet
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9782
Be sure to check out Moonpath to Elsweyr on the Steam Workshop!
author: Mushu323
